game.name: Slipgate
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Explore the gloomy rooms of a sci-fi base as a doomed marine, the sole survivor of the portal experiment. Save humanity as you did in the 90s with your trusty shotgun, make your way through ominous corridors inhabited by the shadows of sinners and evil spirits.
